name: Catch!!!
description:
An arcade game made with HTML, CSS and Javascript. You play as a cube desperatly trying to collect all the circles. Each circle you collect is 1 point. Try to collect as many circles by the time the 30 seconds is up!!!

This project is currently under BETA and will be updated throughout the future.

Note: This is one of my first games so there are a few bugs that I'll soon patch!!
